description: Ride-hailing apps have revolutionized city and inter-city travel, offering convenience and on-demand service. They are great for airport transfers, sightseeing, and short trips.
sentences: Ride-hailing apps like Ola and Uber are widely available in Indian cities.
Compare prices between different apps, especially during peak hours.
For outstation travel, you can book one-way or round-trip cabs.
Always verify the car number and driver details before starting the trip.
Share your trip details with a friend or family member for safety.
dos: Check the driver's rating before booking.
Use the in-app safety features if you feel uncomfortable.
Ensure the driver starts the trip in the app.
Pay through the app for a digital record of the transaction.
donts: Don't engage in offline trips with the driver for a lower fare.
Don't share unnecessary personal information with the driver.
Avoid leaving your belongings behind in the cab.
Don't argue with the driver over tolls or state taxes if they are applicable.
